info.title: BugShot API Documentation
info.description: OpenApi documentation using swagger for BugShot project.

get.summary: Download one attachment. (Not Working In Swagger.)

451.description: Requested action aborted: local error in processing

get.summary: Handle the process of verifying a users email. (Doesn't seem to be working on swagger)

post.summary: Resends the verification mail to the user

get.summary: Get the billing address of a specific model

post.summary: Store a billing address for a given model

base64.description: The base64 string of the image belonging to the company (optional)
The base64 string of the image belonging to the company (optional)

put.summary: Update a users role in a given company.

role_id.description: The id of the new role

post.summary: Invite a user to the company and asign a role to him

409.description: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

get.summary: Show all invitations that the user has received.

post.summary: Invite a user to the organization and asign a role to him

The base64 string of the image belonging to the company (optional)

get.summary: All project markers according to a given url.

post.summary: Invite a user to the project and asign it a role

get.summary: Show stripe balance of billing address.
Show the setup intent form for the billing address

post.summary: Retrieve a collection of payment methods

type.description: Specifies the type of payment method that shall be retrieved

post.summary: Create a new subscription for the billing address

subscription_name.description: The name of the selected subscription (only for internal use)

price_api_id.description: The api id of the price

payment_method_id.description: The Id of the selected payment method

quantity.description: The amount of subscriptions that shall be created

post.summary: Change the quantity of the given subscription

type.description: Specifies if the quantity is an increment or decrement

quantity.description: Specifies the quantity that shall be added/removed from the subscription

get.summary: Get a list of the stripe products
Get a list of the stripe subscriptions of a specific user

post.summary: Assign a subscription to a user

restricted_subscription_usage.description: Defines if the user is only allowed to use this subscription within the

user_id.description: The id of the user the subscription shall be assigned to

user_id.description: The id of the user the subscription is assigned to
